summary: Add a friendly wrapper around listWorkflowExecutions that returns a lazy paginator, handling pagination automatically under the hood instead of requiring direct API calls.
userImpact: Users can more easily retrieve workflow execution lists with automatic pagination handling instead of managing API calls directly.
proposedFix: Wrap the listWorkflowExecutions API request and return a paginator object that implements pagination logic lazily.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented and the issue was closed.
keyQuote: Wrap API request and return a paginator as result. The paginator should be lazy and implement pagination API under the hood.
